author: Slidebean
description:
Big Tech is finally going to trial.

A landmark lawsuit accusing Meta, Instagram, Facebook, and others of harming minors’ mental health is officially heading to trial on January 27, 2026.
The case alleges that social platforms fostered addictive behaviors linked to anxiety, depression, and self-harm in teens.
It could mark the first time Big Tech is held accountable for its impact on youth.
Maybe just maybe this is the turning point we’ve been waiting for.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: A historic lawsuit could redefine how social media treats youth

author: Slidebean
description:
ChatGPT can now spend your money for you.

OpenAI just partnered with PayPal, letting users shop and pay directly inside ChatGPT.
It’s part of the new in app “store” model, where third party tools plug into the chatbot.
So yes, ChatGPT can now recommend something and help you buy it, right there.
The future of e-commerce? Or just an easier way to empty your wallet faster?

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: ChatGPT just got a PayPal button.

author: Slidebean
description: Tune in every week for startup news, rants, and comedy.
